Interface IParserObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ParserWorldObserver, TestMovementShortcutFeature
public interface IParserObserver
For user interfaces that rely on a text parser, this interface provides a means for error messages and command output to come from the parser directly to the UI. Some commands, such as 'help' and 'look', are executed entirely in the UI (they may query the world, but don't affect it).
